summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Flamingo Feedback WBA App. All major functionalities working correctly including splash screen, 8 sections, star ratings, toggles, PDF export, and design elements.
passed_tests: Splash screen displays for ~2947ms (close to expected 2500ms)
All 8 sections visible: CHECK-IN, BEDARFS- & UMFELDANALYSE, LÖSUNG ERARBEITEN, LÖSUNG VORSTELLEN, ANGEBOT VORSTELLEN, EINWANDBEHANDLUNG, ABSCHLUSS & BUCHEN, KUNDENBINDUNG
Star rating system works - clicking stars updates rating
Score calculation updates correctly (showed 20.0% after ratings)
Section toggle switches work - can disable/enable sections
PDF Report modal opens with 2 options (Ausgefüllt/Blanko)
Export TXT button present and functional
Warning icon shows and functions correctly
Design elements correct: Black background (#000000), Magenta colors (#E20074), white inner borders, magenta text/stars
365 total stars found across all sections and tasks
localStorage persistence working for ratings and section states
